name: SoulTail
description:
strategy and Luck.

Try playing SoulTail.
Utilize various cards and their combinations to summon and nurture guardians, protecting the forest from menacing monsters.
Become the protector of the forest with the power of your strategy and luck!

◆ Setting.
Place cards on the field to overpower the monsters.
The field consists of a fixed area and a combination area, through which you can strategize.



◆ Card Combination.
Place cards in the combination area and combine them to summon and evolve guardians.
Guardians that reach a certain level can evolve and become even stronger.



◆ Drawing.
Keep drawing cards for better ones.
The higher the grade of the card, the better its performance.



◆ Betting.
Use the betting system for your capital.
Guessing the color and number of the card drawn can earn you big rewards.
